actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that hearings should be held to review the implementation of Federal laws designed to ensure that each noncontiguous area of the United States and each region of the United States has an adequate reserve of crude oil, residual fuel oil, and refined petroleum products.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that hearings should be held to review the implementation of laws such as the Energy Policy and Conservation Act which were designed to ensure that each noncontiguous area of the United States and each region of the United States has an adequate reserve of crude oil, residual fuel oil, and refined petroleum products.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that hearings should be held to review the implementation of Federal laws designed to ensure that each noncontiguous area of the United States and each region of the United States has an adequate reserve of crude oil, residual fuel oil, and refined petroleum products.
